version_description:
Dear Generals,

thank you for all the positive feedback we got from you over the last weeks and especially the criticism pushing us to make the game even better. Enjoy a few minor fixes and updates with this patch and keep the feedback coming. Detailed release can be found on the main menu.

See you on the battlefield!

See you on the battlefield!

Dear Generals!

Next to several small bug-fixes and proper adjustments of in-game images, the arrival time is properly displayed again in the mobile version. For more details check the update news on the main menu.

See you in the trenches!

Dear Generals,

this release delivers several bug fixes for the new Flanders Front as well as the game in general. Incorrectly displayed army labels and unknown and unselectable armies are now a thing of the past. Gas clouds are now more accurate in displaying their area of effect in addition to a green circle highlighting it. For more details read the Update News on the main menu.

See you on the battlefield!

Attention Generals,

This release delivers several bug fixes for Supremacy 1914. AI enemy troops do not skip movement time when countering a ranged attack on their province anymore. We also resolved an issue that kept you from selecting your units in certain areas of the Pacific Ocean. The last online timer in the alliance ranking is fixed as well.

See you on the battlefield!

Today’s release brings a lot of bug fixes for Supremacy 1914. We resolved an issue that prevented members of the High Command to challenge alliances, we fixed the home button on mobile devices and much more. We also bring back our “Gold Rush Event” after more than a year. Check our Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “Gold rush” event starting on Friday 11th of October.

Today’s release brings some minor bug fixes to Supremacy 1914! To give you an example, we fixed an issue that prevented some players from scrolling down in the “All offers” section of the stock market. Fixes like that might not sound big, but should make your game experience much more convenient.

This week’s release sets out to greatly improve your game experience with a number of noteworthy changes to the AI, the timing of the day change event, and a whole new way to track your progress towards victory. Check our Supremacy 1914 Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “Swift Strike” event starting on Friday 29th of November.

We are very excited to bring sound and music to Supremacy 1914! Yes, you read correctly! The new Supremacy 1914 soundtrack will immerse you more in the game than ever before! Hear the action on the map and listen to your troops fight for victory!

Next Event: Rush for Europe x6 Speed

Supremacy 1914 is a unique game of deep strategy. To present new players with a smooth learning curve we have worked on a better way to explain the features, menus and information available in the game. The result is the brand-new contextual tutorial! Check our news section and sign up for our Gold Rush event this weekend!

Today we released a big amount of bug fixes, improvements and a new 5th fire control mode - Offensive! The offensive setting allows you to move your troops where they are needed, knowing that they will protect themselves in case an enemy comes in range, but will not trigger a war by their actions.
 Check our Call of War Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “Operation Supremacy” event starting on Friday.

Today’s release implements a new way revolts are calculated in Supremacy 1914.
Check our Supremacy 1914 Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “6x Speedround” event starting on Thursday, July 16th 2020.

Today’s update brings several bug fixes to Supremacy 1914! Among them, is the fix of sliders in the game. Yes, sliders. Your wiggly friends work again!
Check our Supremacy 1914 Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss signing up for our “Colonial Uprising” event starting on Thursday, August 27th 2020.

Today’s release brings the reworked army and province bars to all mobile devices! All radial menus have been removed and the most important buttons and information are in convenient thumb reach now. Check our Supremacy 1914 Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “Ice and Steel” event starting on Thursday, October 8th, 2020.

Today’s update brings new WebGL shaders to Supremacy 1914 which will improve performance on large maps. The option to watch short video ads and thereby earn Free Gold will be rolled out to users in multiple phases as well. Check our Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “4x Speedround” event starting on Thursday, May 13th 2021.

Today’s update fixes the nasty keyboard issue that made the interface overlay the written text on some mobile devices when writing messages. We’re also making changes to the size of army labels. Check our Supremacy 1914 Update News on the main menu to find all the details and don’t miss to sign up for our “Rush for Europe” event starting on Thursday, June 10th 2021.
